channel.title: [508]Run Error![508]
channel.description:
[size=12pt]Hi there, i am new to coding and i just compiled, it worked fine. Then i tried to run the server. An error came up. I already looked at that run and compile error help thing in the tutorial section i believe. This type of error wasn't there. Well here is the error. By the way, i am using a palidino 76 source. ;)[/size]
̉̉̉[code]java.net.BindException: Address already in use: JVM_Bind at java.net.PlainSocketImpl.socketBind(Native Method) at java.net.PlainSocketImpl.bind(Unknown Source) at java.net.ServerSocket.bind(Unknown Source) at java.net.ServerSocket.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.net.ServerSocket.<init>(Unknown Source) at palidino76.rs2.net.SocketListener.<init>(SocketListener.java:40) at palidino76.rs2.Server.main(Server.java:45) Press any key to continue . . .̉̉̉̉̉̉̉̉̉̉̉̉[/code] [size=12pt] Anybody know how to fix it?[/size]

item.dc:creator: @iamapker iamapker
item.description:
@iamapker wrote:

Jo∃:

Anybody else? Please i need major help!

atleast say ty he tried to help jeez… i think your problem is, either your Firewall from Online or Control Panel is blockin it or you already have something running under that. maybe not not sure but check to see in firewalls

item.description:
@Jo11 wrote:

[size=12pt]Hi there, i am new to coding and i just compiled, it worked fine. Then i tried to run the server. An error came up. I already looked at that run and compile error help thing in the tutorial section i believe. This type of error wasn’t there.
Well here is the error. By the way, i am using a palidino 76 source. ;)[/size]

̉̉̉java.net.BindException: Address already in use: JVM_Bind at java.net.PlainSocketImpl.socketBind(Native Method) at java.net.PlainSocketImpl.bind(Unknown Source) at java.net.ServerSocket.bind(Unknown Source) at java.net.ServerSocket.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.net.ServerSocket.<init>(Unknown Source) at palidino76.rs2.net.SocketListener.<init>(SocketListener.java:40) at palidino76.rs2.Server.main(Server.java:45) Press any key to continue . . .̉̉̉̉̉̉̉̉̉̉̉̉

Anybody know how to fix it?[/size]
